name: Summon Earth Elemental
summary: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.
description:
You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast summon elemental as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an earth elemental.Traits

Oread: Oreads are planar scions descended from shaitans.
